title: Paskezlest
author: Paskezlest
created_time: September 16, 2023, 09:52:23 PMLast edit: September 17, 2023, 01:26:40 AM by Paskezlest
content: Metalet - Your Ultimate Metaverse Chain Wallet!DOWNLOADDiscover the Future of Metaverse Wallets with MetaletAre you ready to embark on a journey into the Metaverse? Look no further! We're thrilled to introduce you to Metalet, the ultimate Metaverse Chain wallet designed to revolutionize your digital experience.Metalet simplifies your Metaverse journey by providing a secure and user-friendly wallet solution: Wallet Security: Your wallet keys are stored locally in your browser's localStorage. For added security, you have the option to encrypt them with a password, ensuring your digital assets remain safe and sound. Explore Metalet: To learn more about Metalet and to get started, visit our official website at Metalet Official Website. You can also install the Metalet Chrome Extension for a seamless experience. Build Locally: Developers, take note! If you want to build Metalet locally, here are the steps:     Ensure you have Node.js version 14 installed. Use yarn to manage dependencies.     Execute yarn build.     Find uncompressed builds in the /dist directory.     Install it in Chrome using developer mode. Develop with Metalet: We're committed to empowering developers. Here are some key insights into how to develop with Metalet:     Utilize the sendMessageFromExtPageToBackground method to send messages from the client page to background.js.     Your accounts are securely stored in indexDb. When you create a new account, Metalet automatically saves your user info in both localStorage and indexDb.     With Metalet, you can inject a content-script into third-party pages, enabling you to use the Metalet API wherever you go.Join the Metaverse Revolution Today!Are you ready to dive into the Metaverse with Metalet? Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to simplify your Metaverse journey and elevate your digital experience.Visit our official website here or install the Metalet Chrome Extension to get started. If you're a developer, dive into the project and contribute to the future of Metaverse wallets!Stay connected with us as we embark on this exciting journey into the Metaverse. Metalet - Your Metaverse Chain wallet of choice!Metalet Official Website: https://www.mvc.space/metalet.html
